channel.title: 718 Help
channel.description:
Hello, I recently found out that DragonKK released the Matrix source, I've coded a few 667s and i'm an okay coder, but I downloaded Matrix, and I got this error
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/zv8rj7.png[/img] *Note* + I did upgrade my jdk / jre to the lastest
if it is possible for me to local host it, I'd re-code the whole home,shops,npcs loads more! try to get 100% working g.e if it hasn't already (probaly has) 100% working money pouch ect! If anyone has fixed links to the source + client, please message me them thanks! (when my forums are up for the server if the source works, I'll give credits to DragonKK + the person to helped me)
Please could anyone help me, I hope you can so I can become a better coder! Thanks for reading, Regards - Exos (Matt)

item.title: 718 Help
item.dc:creator: @Exos Exos
item.description:
@Exos wrote:

AssassinsCRB:

Ooh ik the fix!! Well i’m not sure if this is the right way to do it but, it works fine :D, I think they made the filepath wrong and idk how to fix it so I did this: when into java, JRE7, bin it is looking for the folder in there called “client” so i copied that pasted it in that same location and renamed it as server and it worked fine! Hope i helped!

Thank you! but the run works fine now

But I run a client, on local host and it stays on 1% do you know anything to fix that? and I saw people upload a compiler code, is their still one out? or how can I make one, sorry for all the requests.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @AssassinsCRB AssassinsCRB
item.description:
@AssassinsCRB wrote:

Ooh ik the fix!! Well i’m not sure if this is the right way to do it but, it works fine :D, I think they made the filepath wrong and idk how to fix it so I did this: when into java, JRE7, bin it is looking for the folder in there called “client” so i copied that pasted it in that same location and renamed it as server and it worked fine! Hope i helped!
